title: Weather app
desc: This project was made using the OpenWeatherMap API which gave access to weather statistics for the current day and for the coming week, I also used their geocode API to get the longitude and latitude of the input cities.

title: Media Library
desc: A CRUD application used to store entries about a users media library/collection (i.e, books, movies, music). Made with React, Tailwind and localStorage

title: Restaurant Menu
desc: A Restaurant menu application made with NextJS, the dish data is stored in JSON and can be conditionally rendered using react components

title: Google Clone
desc: This was one of my first projects where I learned to replicate a landing page with CSS

title: Mint Sign-up Clone
desc: Another vanilla CSS replication project - a sign up form for creating a new account.

title: This portfolio
desc: Though not finished, this portfolio was made using React-Router and Tailwind CSS
